data.description: Pure Perl PostgreSQL driver for the DBI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The DBI driver of PostgreSQL database implemented by pure Perl does
    not exist now. Although PgSQL.pm exists as a module of pure Perl
    which is not DBI, it is not maintained here now.

    <dbi-dev@perl.org> is discussing a name called DBD::PgPP before.
    http://archive.develooper.com/dbi-dev@perl.org/msg01080.html #
